title: A Stuntman's Bucket List
itunes:title: A Stuntman's Bucket List
description:
Nikki and Mark discuss travel tips shared by listeners. Then, adventurer and TV host Aldo Kane talks about everything from rowing across the Atlantic to the essentials he packs to survive in any circumstance. He also shares an unlikely, lesser-known spot in Scotland that’s one of Europe’s unexpected surfing meccas. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
